articles.title: Explosion rocks Georgia Guidestones, dubbed 'America's Stonehenge' - Reuters
articles.description: A peculiar granite monument that some have dubbed "America's Stonehenge" but a conservative politician condemned as "Satanic" was torn down on Wednesday by authorities in rural Georgia hours after it was heavily damaged in a bombing by vandals.
